mapper.select: select t.id as id, t.class1 as class1, t.class2 as class2, t.class3 as class3 from classification t
select t.id as id, t.class1 as class1, t.class2 as class2, t.class3 as class3 from classification t where t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into classification ( class1 , class2 , class3) values (#{class1},#{class2},#{class3})
mapper.update: update classification set class1=#{class1}, class2=#{class2}, class3=#{class3} where id=#{id}
